channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Honey mustard glazed pork with mash
Vegetarian sausage cassoulet
item.description:
Vegetarian sausage cassoulet



Cassoulet is a rich and hearty dish that is traditionally slow-cooked and made with meat. In this recipe, however, we've halved the time and opted for Linda McCartney sausages for a delicious vegetarian treat that's packed with wholesome flavour..

item.title: Pancetta penne all'arrabbiata
item.description:
Pancetta penne all'arrabbiata



These warming and hearty Penne all'Arrabbiata with pancetta are bursting full of flavours and make the perfect dinner night option..

item.title: Vegetable tagine
item.description:
Vegetable tagine



Add some Moroccan flare to your mealtimes with this delicious tagine. Dried fruit is often used in this dish to offset the spices..

item.title: Veggie rice pot
item.description:
Veggie rice pot



Forget the takeaway and make your own Chinese special rice at home. You can add all sorts of other veg to this too, such as beansprouts, broccoli florets and baby corn..

item.title: Vegan chickpea tikka masala
item.description:
Vegan chickpea tikka masala



This delicious (and vegan!) chickpea tikka masala recipe hits the spot when youâ€™re craving Indian food. Serve it up over rice and garnish with plenty of fresh cilantro!.
